data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Mandla. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Mandla, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Mandla to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Mandla, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 11,604 believers in Mandla to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Mang Garudi people.
Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Mandla, Madhya Pradesh, India into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Mandla, Madhya Pradesh, India to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Mandla, Madhya Pradesh, India has a population of 1,054,900.

We estimate Mandla has 11,604 people who might know Jesus, 12,799 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,030,497 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 1,054,900 people living in Mandla, Madhya Pradesh, India. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

location.name: Mandla
